title: PUMA Deviate Nitro 2
technology: Technologies  MIDSOLE NITRO foam is a nitrogen infused foam designed to provide responsive cushioning in a lightweight package. NITRO Elite foam is extremely lightweight and delivers high rebound.  PWRPLATE is an engineered carbon plate that stabilizes the midsole while maximizing energy transfer. OUTSOLE PUMAGRIP ATR is a multi-terrain rubber that is more durable for harsh elements and terrain. UPPER Mesh Upper is well-fitting and highly breathable. PWRTAPE overlays provide upper support and durability.
